Claim: Wounded Warrior Project offers a no-cost program for veterans designed to help warriors living with post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD), military sexual trauma (MST) and traumatic brain injury (TBI) and their families
Warriors never pay a penny for Wounded Warrior Project’s programs and services — because they paid their dues on the battlefield
76% of warriors who complete the Wounded Warrior Project Warrior Care Network program experience fewer PTSD symptoms
Wounded Warrior Project’s members often find a lifelong support system and the treatment and tools needed to manage their anger, heal their family and themselves
